data.title: You Know the Drill
data.text: The draw of McDonald's is that you are already familiar with the menu and you get consistent quality fast food. The french fries are the best in the world as long as you eat them in the 10 minute window of french fry magic. This eatery is no different than any other and that's why we like the place. Fries have been cooking at this location as far back as the 60's. It was my go to place in high school and remains so almost 50 years later. The new all day breakfast is the smartest thing McDonald's has done since the french fry hit the oil. Give it a go!! Take the kids.

data.title: A very busy local hangout
data.text: I love the decor of this vintage McDonalds.  Inside it is clean and modern and spacious.  I hate the long drive through although I realize this busy fast food restaurant serves lots of locals fast.  I eat inside to avoide the long lines.

data.title: Malia's favorite place for French Fries!!!
data.text: Malia's favorite place for French Fries!!!
